name: Private Snake
description:
(This game was made as an entry for Global Game Jam 2020 and was made to be in a arcade machine)

You're a snake in space trying to defend a space station from asteroids coming their way!

Protect the space station with your body, but careful! Too many hits and you'll start to lose pieces of you body! Some large asteroid will repair your body so you can keep helping the space station

Controls:

W, S and Enter -> Navigate the main menu

A and D -> Turn left or right;

Left Shift -> Boost

Know bugs:

If you use the mouse on the main menu, the game wont crash, but it wont be playable as you will be stuck in the menus. If that happens, the only solution is to exit the game through alt+f4 and restar. Sorry for the incovenience!
